#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

const double error = 1.0/120;
vector<string>times[365]; 

int main() {
	cin.sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin.tie(0);
	cout << fixed << setprecision(10);
	int mx =10000000;
	vector<int> minD(mx+47,0);
	for(int i =2; i <= mx; i++) if(minD[i] == 0)
		for(int j =1; j <= mx/i; j++) minD[i*j] =i;
	int T;
	scanf(" %d",&T);
	while(T--) 
	{
		int N;
		long long ans =1;
		scanf(" %d",&N);
		while(N > 1) {
			int p =minD[N], ppw =1;
			while(N%p == 0) {
				ppw *=p;
				N /=p;}
			ans *=1LL*ppw*ppw-(1LL*ppw*ppw-1)/(p+1);}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
